nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.4
Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.4 is the 4th issue of the 6th volume of Star Wars Comic UK, published in February 2010.
The comic also included a comic strip entitled "The Droid Deception."

The free gift for this issue was a set of three mini-notepads and a Clone Wars pen.
The notepads have sparkly covers with Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and a clone trooper printed on them.
